reviews.comment: Fantastic Cuban food! The Cuban Sandwich was authentic and flavorful.
Great place for a taste of Cuba. Loved the Ropa Vieja and Tostones.
Nice café with a good selection of Cuban dishes. The Flan was amazing.
Authentic Cuban cuisine in a cozy setting. The Black Bean Soup was delicious.
Good food but the service was a bit slow. Worth a visit for the Cuban Sandwich.
